text: Friendly and cozy. Nice and comfortable patio. They have decent wine list - especially Italian and alexander valley reds caught my eyes. But price is little overwhelming.
Ambiance and excellent food! The seafood starter was perfect and the veal chop superb.  Friendly and efficient staff. This is a real treat!

Amazing food and amazing staff, 10/10 recommend to anyone looking for a nice sit down fine dining restaurant to go on dates or any sort of celebration, i highly recommend any of the stakes or game dishes, even the pastas or the apps are to die for!
